items.sentence: I want to go to Boston just as badly as you do.
We never stay anywhere longer than three weeks.
I'm wearing the jacket I bought three days ago.
Tom just kept saying he didn't know the answer.
Tom is no longer planning to be here on Monday.
I never stay anywhere for more than three days.
Tom wondered if Mary would know what was wrong.
I don't know how to persuade Tom to go with us.
It's been a long time since I've talked to Tom.
It took me three years to learn how to do this.
Do you three think you could help me right now?
Tom probably thought I could stay until Monday.
The cup you just broke was the one Tom gave me.
Why don't you just tell Tom you don't like him?
Tom probably thought I wasn't going to be here.
It was Tom who saved the girl who was drowning.
I wonder who Tom is going to go to Boston with.
I didn't want to tell Tom the truth, but I did.
Tom almost left his umbrella in the restaurant.
Neither Tom nor Mary has to go to the hospital.
